docs.lead_paragraph: Almost 1,300 migrants arrived in Sicily on rescue ships over the weekend after crossing the Mediterranean, while a 16-year-old boy died on one of the ships, Italy's Coast Guard said.

headline.print_headline: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend
headline.main: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend

docs.snippet: Almost 1,300 migrants arrived in Sicily on rescue ships over the weekend after crossing the Mediterranean, while a 16-year-old boy died on one of the ships, Italy's Coast Guard said....

docs.lead_paragraph: A British man was shot dead in northern Kenya on Sunday at a private ranch in the Laikipia area, two of the man's neighbors said, and a legislator warned that local politicians were stoking violence as elections approach.

headline.print_headline: British Father of Two Shot Dead at Kenyan Ranch
headline.main: British Father of Two Shot Dead at Kenyan Ranch

docs.snippet: A British man was shot dead in northern Kenya on Sunday at a private ranch in the Laikipia area, two of the man's neighbors said, and a legislator warned that local politicians were stoking violence as elections approach....

docs.lead_paragraph: Dutch nationalist Geert Wilders, who is expected to make huge gains in a March 15 election, said on Sunday he would ban Turkish officials from political campaigning in the Netherlands.

headline.print_headline: Dutch Nationalist Wilders-Ban Turkish Campaigning in the Netherlands
headline.main: Dutch Nationalist Wilders-Ban Turkish Campaigning in the Netherlands

docs.lead_paragraph: Under-fire candidate Francois Fillon has lost support in France's presidential election campaign, but fellow conservative Alain Juppe would reach the second round should he replace him, an opinion poll said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Poll Shows Fillon Losing Votes in French Presidential Race, Juppe in 2nd Round if He Stood
headline.main: Poll Shows Fillon Losing Votes in French Presidential Race, Juppe in 2nd Round if He Stood

docs.lead_paragraph: Since the Trump administration began, more than 90 Obama-era federal regulations have been revoked or delayed or enforcement has been suspended, in many cases based on requests from the industries the rules target. Here are 12 examples.

headline.main: Rolling Back Rules: A Dozen Examples

docs.snippet: Since the Trump administration began, more than 90 Obama-era federal regulations have been revoked or delayed or enforcement has been suspended, in many cases based on requests from the industries the rules target. Here are 12 examples....

docs.lead_paragraph: In a flurry of deregulation, the Trump administration has already suspended or reversed more than 90 rules. And industry is clamoring for more.

headline.main: Leashes Come Off Wall Street, Gun Sellers, Miners and More

byline.original: By ERIC LIPTON and BINYAMIN APPELBAUM

docs.snippet: In a flurry of deregulation, the Trump administration has already suspended or reversed more than 90 rules. And industry is clamoring for more....

docs.lead_paragraph: The R-rated "X-Men" spinoff "Logan" slashed into the weekend box office, opening with a massive $85.3 million in North American theaters, according to studio estimates Sunday, while best-picture winner "Moonlight" got a significant, if far from superhero-sized, Oscar bump.

headline.print_headline: 'Logan' Slices Box Office With $85.3M,' Moonlight' Gets Bump

docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank expects the re-integration of its Postbank unit to take three to five years, its chief executive said after Germany's top lender announced plans for an 8 billion euro ($8.5 billion) rights issue and a structural shake-up.

headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Sees Postbank Re-Integration Taking 3-5 Years
headline.main: Deutsche Bank Sees Postbank Re-Integration Taking 3-5 Years

docs.lead_paragraph: Sen. Chuck Schumer wants the National Transportation Safety Board to conduct an in-depth investigation of small plane crashes, following two incidents last month and at least 18 crashes in New York last year.
